name: Boventure!
description:
# BROWSER VERSION IS UPDATED TO 1.1 #

.

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 104.

.

Go on an Adventure with your trusty Bo-w, discover areas, collect items, kill baddies & more!

.

Controls:

WASD: move

Space: Dash

Hold Left Click: Charge Arrow.

Release Left Click: Shoot Arrow.

.

Assets used:

some assets from this pack: https://n0t3nl1sh.itch.io/pixel-platformer-asset-pack-1-bit

Font:

https://www.dafont.com/minecraft.font

.

Thanks for playing! Any feedback highly appreciated!

.

Made By

Ven

Music By

Noha
